verbose_text: Activated JAK2 phosphorylates tyrosine residues on the cytosolic domain of the EPO-R, which results in the recruitment of downstream effectors, including growth factor receptor bound protein 2, phosphoinositide-3 kinase (PI3K) and signal transducer and activator of transcription family members.
evidence: Activated JAK2 phosphorylates tyrosine residues on the cytosolic domain of the EPO-R, which results in the recruitment of downstream effectors, including growth factor receptor bound protein 2
